transArray.content: The overall experience was very good. The room was very quiet.

Dear guests, hello! Orange will, as always, provide every guest with a clean, comfortable and warm living environment in accordance with cleanliness standards, and provide every guest with meticulous and attentive service like a housekeeper. We also hope that our unique Orange series of shampoo and conditioner products can provide Every customerâ€™s unique memory, every effort is made to meet you better, dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhang Minghui
